rules_text:
Flash
When Fan la Norne enters, you may activate bond abilities of creatures you control any time you could cast an instant and as though those creatures had haste until end of turn.
Bond [i]({T}: Until end of turn, target nonbonded creature adds this creature’s base power and toughness to its own and becomes bonded. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
2.2.0: Got rid of the bounce (the utility moved to efficient outfitter) and buffed up the power so now it’s a hefty combat trick that gets to push damage afterwards.
2.2.1: Power went back down, it’s still a super cool enabler that can lead to your blades just blowing out combat.
